tasks.task_description: Create Phase 1 test script to validate conversion quality
Test token span accuracy (can we reconstruct original text)
Generate Phase 1 test report with statistics and examples

description: Phase 1 Testing: Validate data conversion quality and correctness
context:
Created Testing/Phase1 folder and test_conversion.py script with 4 tests:
1. Span reconstruction accuracy
2. VA score preservation
3. Linguistic features presence
4. Dataset statistics

Phase 1 Testing Complete! Results:
- Span reconstruction: 99.88% accuracy (2427/2430)
- VA preservation: 95.41% accuracy (2431/2548)
- Linguistic features: 100% coverage
- Training: 1,448 samples, avg 1.68 triplets/sample
- Test: 200 samples with empty labels (correct)
- Overall: PASS - Excellent quality
- Files: test_conversion.py, test_results.json, TEST_REPORT.md
